entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
